import React from 'react' import { getUser, getToken } from "../../services/auth" class PostCard extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.handleDownload = this.handleDownload.bind(this) } handleDownload(postId){ const userId = getUser() console.log(userId) fetch("http://gerarme-api.test/api/post/download/"+postId+"/"+userId, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer' + getToken() } }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) }) } render(){ const image_url = "http://my.gerar.me/storage/app/images/Posts/"+this.props.post.image_url const download_url = "http://gerarme-api.test/posts/download/"+this.props.post.id return (
  • {this.props.post.headline}
